line.token: * @description: migrates older versions of e-commerce to the latest one.
* This has been placed here rather than in the individual classes for the following reasons:
* - not to clog up individual classes
* - to get a complete overview in one class
* - to be able to run parts and older and newer version without having to go through several clases to retrieve them
* @todo: change methods to simple names f10, f20, etc... and then allow individual ones to be run.
Migrates all the data from the oldest version of e-commerce to the current one.
Any obsolete fields will be renamed like this: _obsolete_MyField, but not deleted.
//IN general yes, but if the current one is not finished yet, then we do it again.
//are we doing the same one for a different limti?
"this task is broken down into baby steps - we are now starting at .... "
//NEXT OPTION 1: do again with new limit
"Start Migration by clicking on 'Next' (this link) until all tasks have been completed."
Always make a backup of your database before running any migration tasks.
//NEXT OPTION 4: we have done all of them - no more next option...
<div style=\"width: 400px; height: 20px; padding-top: 20px; font-size: 11px; background: url(/ecommerce/images/loading.gif) no-repeat top left transparent\">
Next step, if any - will load automatically in ten seconds.
* Returns true if the table and field (within this table) exist.
* @param String - $field - name of the field to be tested
* @param String - $table - name of the table to be tested
* Returns true if the table and field (within this table) exist.
* @param String - $field - name of the field to be tested
* @param String - $table - name of the table to be tested
so it could not be removed
but it still seems to be there
In the first version of e-commerce we had the ShopMember class, then we moved this data to Member.
"No need to migrate ShopMember To Member because it does not have any records."
"There is no need to migrate the ShopMember table."
Move the Product ID in OrderItem as ItemID to a new field called BuyableID.
'There is no need to move from ItemID to BuyableID'
Move the product version in the Product_OrderItem table to the OrderItem table.
"There is no need to migrate Product_OrderItem.ProductVersion to OrderItem.Version."
Move the product ID saved as Product_OrderItem.ProductID to OrderItem.BuyableID.
"There is no need to migrate Product_OrderItem.ProductID to OrderItem.BuyableID"
"There is no need to migrate Product_OrderItem.ProductVersion to OrderItem.Version"
// we must check for individual database types here because each deals with schema in a none standard way
"Migrating ProductVariation_OrderItem.ProductVariationID to OrderItem.BuyableID and adding BuyableClassName = ProductVariation"
"There are not ProductVariations in this project"
Move the amount of the modifier in the OrderModifier.Amount field to the OrderAttribute.CalculatedTotal field.
'There is no need to move OrderModifier.Amount to OrderAttribute.CalculatedTotal'
Move the Payment Amount in the Amount field to a composite DB field (AmountAmount + AmountCurrency)
'There is no need to move Payment.Amount to Payment.AmountAmount'
"Potential error in Payment fields update to 2.4, please review data"
'There is no need to move Payment.Currency to Payment.AmountCurrency'
Move the shipping cost in the order to its own modifier.
"There are no orders with HasShippingCost =1 and Shipping IS NOT NULL."
Move the tax in the order to its own modifier.
" ------------- No need to add tax even though field is present"
"There are no orders with a AddedTax field greater than zero."
Move a shipping address from within Order to its own class.
"Strange contradiction occurred in Order with ID"
"No orders need adjusting even though they followed the old pattern."
"There is no UseShippingAddress field even though there is a ShippingAddress Field - this is an issue."
"Orders do not have the shipping address to migrate."
Move the billing address from the order to its own class.
"Strange contradiction occurred in Order with ID"
"No orders need adjusting even though they followed the old pattern."
"There is no UseBillingAddress field even though there is a BillingAddress Field - this is an issue."
"Orders do not have the Billing address to migrate."
Move address details in the member table to its own class (billingaddress)
") now gets its own billing address..."
"There is no member associated with this order "
"No orders need adjusting even though they followed the old pattern."
"There is no Address2 field, but there is an Address field in Member - this might be an issue."
"Members do not have a billing address to migrate."
Moving order status from the enum field to Order Step.
'The order which status was \'Cancelled\' have been successfully changed to the status \'AdminCancelled\''
'There are no orders that are cancelled'
"There is no Status field in the Order Table."
Fixing any orders with an StatusID that is not in use...
"\"StatusID\" = 0 OR \"StatusID\" IS NULL OR \"OrderStep\".\"ID\" IS NULL"
"There are no orders with incorrect order status."
Set the product groups 'show products' to the default.
"SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM \"ProductGroup\" WHERE \"LevelOfProductsToShow\" <> 0 AND \"LevelOfProductsToShow\" IS NOT NULL"
"there is no need for resetting product 'show' levels"
120. Set Fixed Price for Submitted Order Items:
Migration task to fix the price for submitted order items.
"There is no need to move values from OrderModifier.CalculationValue to OrderAttribute.CalculatedTotal"
///////// We should not include the code below
///////// Because it may affect past orders badly.
//TO DO: WHAT THE HELL IS THAT (true)
"All order items have a calculated total...."
Fixed price for all submmitted orders without a fixed one - affected:
140. Move Site Config fields to Ecommerce DB Config
Moving the general config fields from the SiteConfig to the EcommerceDBConfig.
"ERROR: SiteConfig or EcommerceDBConfig are not available"
150. Add a class name to all buyables.
ClassNames used to be implied, this is now saved as OrderItem.BuyableClassName.
does not have a valid class name. This needs investigation.
"No order items could be found that need updating."
Adds TermsAndConditionsMessage if there is a terms page.
"There was no need to add a terms and conditions message because there was already a message."
"There was no need to add a terms and conditions message because there is no terms and conditions page."
"There was no need to add a terms and conditions message because there is no checkout page"
Merges uncompleted orders by the same user into one.
"We have a duplicate order for a member: "
"There are no attributes for this order"
"There are no order status logs for this order"
"There are no emails for this order."
Orders that have already been submitted.
"There were no orders at all to work through."
Sets a starting value for a new field: FullSiteTreeSortField.
"There were no changes in any of the OrderStatusLog_Submitted.SequentialOrderNumber fields."
200. Resave All Products to update the FullName and FullSiteTreeSort Field
Saves and PUBLISHES all the products on the site. You may need to run this task several times.
210. Resave All Product Variations to update the FullName and FullSiteTreeSort Field
Saves all the product variations on the site. You may need to run this task several times.
"There are not ProductVariations in this project"
Creates a checkout page and order confirmation page in case they do not exist.
"No need to create a CheckoutPage Page"
"No need to create an Order Confirmation Page"
Checks the class name of all product images and makes sure they exist.
Replaces a link to a JS Library in the config file
There is no need to update
- does not have the right permission, please change manually.
- even though it is referenced in EcommerceConfig::\$folder_and_file_locations
"There is no need to replace the ecommerce default file: ecommerce/_config/ecommerce.yml"
"Could not find any config files (most usual place: mysite/_config/ecommerce.yml)"
Sets all currencies to the default currency for all orders without a currency.
) have been set a currency value.
We move the data from Payment to EcommercePayment.
"The table Payment has been moved to _obsolete_Payment. We are using _obsolete_Payment to fix things..."
Fixing data in this modifier if it exists.
Removes all the order items without a buyable.
Move all Billing and Shipping Address Mobile Phone Entries to Phone.
"Moving Mobile Phone to Phone in Billing Address"
"UPDATE BillingAddress SET Phone = MobilePhone WHERE Phone = '' OR Phone IS NULL;"
"Moving Mobile Phone to Phone in Shipping Address"
"UPDATE ShippingAddress SET ShippingPhone = ShippingMobilePhone WHERE ShippingPhone = '' OR ShippingPhone IS NULL;"
"Merging Mobile Phone and Phone in Billing Address"
"UPDATE BillingAddress SET Phone = CONCAT(Phone, ' ', MobilePhone) WHERE Phone <> '' AND Phone IS NOT NULL AND MobilePhone <> '' AND MobilePhone IS NOT NULL;"
"Merging Mobile Phone and Phone in Shipping Address"

"UPDATE ShippingAddress SET ShippingPhone = CONCAT(ShippingPhone, ' ', ShippingMobilePhone) WHERE ShippingPhone <> '' AND ShippingPhone IS NOT NULL AND ShippingMobilePhone <> '' AND ShippingMobilePhone IS NOT NULL;"
